mapper.insert: insert into MemberJoin (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_birthday, user_gender, user_email, user_phone, join_date) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_birthday}, #{user_gender}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID FROM MEMBERJOIN WHERE USER_ID = #{checkwords}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_GENDER, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE FROM MEMBERJOIN WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERJOIN SET USER_EMAIL = #{user_email} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
UPDATE MEMBERJOIN SET USER_PHONE = #{user_phone} WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
